# Write a program to calculate a random walk in one dimension. 

```{r}
RW <- function(n){
  walk <- cumsum(sample(c(-1,1), n, TRUE))
  zero <- 0
  ans <- c()
  for (i in walk){
    if (i == 0){
      ans <- c(ans, zero) 
      zero <- 0
    } else{
      zero <- zero +1
    }
  }
  print(ans)
}
RW(30)
```
